value.title: SSL Certificate Configuration Guide
value.content: Step-by-step guide for configuring SSL certificates with Azure Key Vault integration. 1. Create certificate in Key Vault 2. Configure App Service SSL binding 3. Update DNS records 4. Test HTTPS connectivity. Common issues: Certificate chain validation, wildcard certificate setup, automatic renewal configuration.

value.title: Deployment Troubleshooting Guide
value.content: Common deployment issues and solutions for Azure Container Apps. Authentication failures: Check service principal permissions. Build failures: Verify Dockerfile syntax and dependencies. Runtime errors: Check environment variables and secrets. Performance issues: Review resource allocation and scaling settings.

value.title: Database Performance Optimization
value.content: Best practices for optimizing database connections and query performance. Connection pooling: Configure max pool size and timeout settings. Query optimization: Use proper indexing and avoid N+1 queries. Monitoring: Set up Application Insights for database metrics. Scaling: Consider read replicas and sharding strategies.

value.title: Redis Caching Implementation Guide
value.content: Comprehensive guide for implementing Redis caching with Azure Cache for Redis. Cache patterns: Cache-aside, write-through, write-behind strategies. Configuration: Connection strings, SSL settings, clustering setup. Best practices: Key naming conventions, expiration policies, memory optimization. Monitoring: Cache hit rates and performance metrics.

value.title: API Integration Best Practices
value.content: Guidelines for robust API integration with third-party services. Error handling: Implement retry logic with exponential backoff. Circuit breaker pattern: Prevent cascade failures. Authentication: OAuth 2.0 and API key management. Rate limiting: Respect API quotas and implement throttling. Monitoring: Track API response times and error rates.

value.title: Account Lockout Resolution
value.content: Steps to resolve user account lockout issues. Immediate actions: Unlock account in Azure AD, reset password if needed. Investigation: Check sign-in logs for failed attempts, review conditional access policies. Prevention: Configure smart lockout settings, implement MFA, user education on password policies.

value.title: CI/CD Pipeline Setup Guide
value.content: Complete guide for setting up automated CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps. Pipeline stages: Build, test, security scan, deploy. Branch policies: Require pull requests, automated testing. Deployment strategies: Blue-green, canary, rolling deployments. Monitoring: Pipeline success rates, deployment frequency metrics.

value.title: Security Vulnerability Response
value.content: Incident response procedures for security vulnerabilities. Immediate response: Isolate affected systems, assess impact scope. Investigation: Analyze logs, identify attack vectors, document timeline. Remediation: Apply patches, update configurations, strengthen controls. Communication: Notify stakeholders, prepare incident report.

value.title: Machine Learning Model Monitoring
value.content: Best practices for monitoring ML model performance in production. Metrics tracking: Accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score trends. Data drift detection: Monitor input feature distributions. Model retraining: Automated triggers based on performance degradation. MLOps pipeline: Version control, automated testing, deployment strategies.

value.title: Business Intelligence Dashboard Creation
value.content: Guide for creating effective BI dashboards with Power BI and Azure Analytics. Data sources: Connect to SQL, CosmosDB, APIs. Visualization best practices: Choose appropriate chart types, color schemes, layout design. Performance optimization: Data modeling, query optimization, incremental refresh. Sharing and security: Workspace permissions, row-level security.
